Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line expressing wild-type and mutant ALDH2 proteins.

Readout description.Result Description: The mutant ALDH2 protein was not detected in the cell lysate.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for both wild-type and mutant samples.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type ALDH2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Validation controls P/LP.Counts: 2 (one pathogenic variant and one likely pathogenic variant)

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used to compare the protein expression levels between wild-type and mutant samples.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression level should be above the threshold set by the experimental protocol.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression level should be below the threshold set by the experimental protocol.
